attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition if you agree the following:

Upon leaving school, youngsters should be given the opportunity of further education, work or entering into the services for training.

If neither are chosen or no such opportunity arises after a period of 6 months, then conscription to enable a young person should be enforced.

The young person would learn a trade, be given proper motivation, work ethic, and dignity as well as a wage.

In effect, there should be nobody on the streets who is not in some kind of active work.
